channel.title: Contact on AMC SIGHPC Education Chapter
channel.description: Recent content in Contact on AMC SIGHPC Education Chapter

item.title: SIGHPC Education Chapter Officers
item.description: SIGHPC Education Chapter Officers Volunteerism is the key component to the continued success of our SIGHPC Education Chapter. We encourage SIGHPC members to consider serving as a chapter officer. Nominations and applications for officers will be conducted each year and must be submitted around mid-April. The officers shall be elected by a plurality of the votes cast at the annual election, to be held towards the end of April. New officers will take office in May and serve for one year.
